title: Professor Chomsky Lecture with MIT Armenian Society
description: An interview of Professor Noam Chomsky of MIT by David Barsamian.  The interview takes us on a general overview of the state of the Middle East, and the role that Turkey has played in it.  Covering the origins of ISIS all the way to the Kurdish issues in Turkey, Professor Chomsky gives us a glimpse of the complex politics of the area and his opinion on the future moving forward.
